text: @SteveScalise I Totally agree with HouseSpeaker Nancy Pelosi we are still in a pandemic is COVID-19 Coronavirus is Still Active & Spreading Cases are very present in States so she’s Concerned about slowing down the Spread of Coronavirus just as all Elected officials should be #VoteFromHome
